title: Kekkon Suru Tte Itta Yone?
alternative_title: 結婚するって言ったよね？ ; Kekkon Suru tte Itta Yone? ; You Said You Will Marry Me, Right?
status: 結婚するって言ったよね？ ; Kekkon Suru tte Itta Yone? ; You Said You Will Marry Me, Right?
description:
Description :
        The main character, who promised to get married when he turned 18, looked at his family and realized "marriage is hell," but it was already too late. His childhood friend has grown up into a super duper nutjob woman he can't escape from?!

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 3: You Said You Will Marry Me, Right?
